 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָעַר‎</span>] **verb** ==storm, rage== (Ecclus. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סער‎</span> Hiph\`il [[Eccl.47.17|Eccl 47:17]] ***move tempestuously***; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְעָרָה‎</span> ***storm-wind*** [[Eccl.43.17|Eccl 43:17]]; [[Eccl.48.9|Eccl 48:9]] Late Hebrew Pi\`el ***stir up, blow***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְעָרָה‎</span> ***storm-wind***; = II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂעַר‎</span>, but relation obscure; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***šâru***</u></abbr>, ***wind***, favours originality of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂ‎</span>, but this only late in Hebrew, and for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ס‎</span> [[BDB#Frä|Frä]]<sup>189</sup> compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***kindle fire, excite, inflame, be vehemently hungry and thirsty, be mad, insane***, etc. [[BDB#Lane|Lane]]<sup>1363</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural figurative, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִסְעֲרוּ‎</span> [[Hab.3.14|Hab 3:14]] ***they*** [my foes] ***storm along*** to scatter me; ***Participle active*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סֹעֵר‎</span> [[Jonah.1.11|Jonah 1:11]] the sea ***was growing*** more and more ***stormy***, so v[[Jonah.1.13|Jonah 1:13]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲלֵיהֶם‎</span>); feminine <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סֹעֲרָה‎</span> [[Isa.54.11|Isa 54:11]] ***storm-tossed*** (figurative of Jerusalem). **Niph\`al** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּסָּעֵר‎</span> [[2Kgs.6.11|2Kgs 6:11]] and the heart of the king . . . ***was enraged*** because of (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלֿ‎</span>) this thing. **Pi\`el** ***Imperfect*** 1 singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְאֵסָֽעֲרֵם עַלֿ‎</span> [[Zech.7.14|Zech 7:14]] (on form see [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:23h»§§ 23h</sup>, «GKC:52n»52n) ***and storm them away*** (hurl them by a storm-wind) ***upon*** the nations. **Po.** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּמֹץ יְסֹעֵר‎</span> [[Hos.13.3|Hos 13:3]] shall be ***like chaff*** (which) ***is storm-driven*** from a threshing-floor.
